name: Hiragana Hero
description:
Hiragana Hero

You're traveling home for the holidays, but your plane was just waylaid in Hokkaido, Japan! That's great...except the locals don't speak English. What's a poor gaijin to do?

Match the tiles and learn the Japanese alphabet of Hiragana (along with many words associated with this year's winter theme) in this #MGJ2016 submission.
